mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER = #{member} AND HIDE = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (EMAIL, PASSWORD, PHONE, NAME, NICKNAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, JOB, MONEY, LOCATION, CODE, ROLE) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{job}, #{money}, #{location}, #{code}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE CODE = #{code}
